hero.title: Sadhana Pro
hero.subtitle: Customizable Sadhana & Habit Tracker
hero.description: Sadhana Pro is a modern, fully customizable web application designed to track your sadhana practice or everyday habits. It supports creating your own custom metrics with types like numbers, text, boolean, time of day, and duration in minutes — making it suitable for a wide range of spiritual, personal growth, and lifestyle tracking needs.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.customisableDescription: Add your own fields with types like numbers, text, boolean, time of day, and duration.
keyFeatures.reportsDescription: Build custom reports and visualize multiple metrics together over time.
keyFeatures.offlineDescription: Enter and track your data even without an internet connection.
keyFeatures.installDescription: Add it to your phone's home screen for a native app-like experience.
keyFeatures.shareDescription: Share interactive graphs with others via generated links.
keyFeatures.groupDescription: Join groups, track together, and see each other's data in table format.
keyFeatures.dataDescription: Import and export your data as CSV files for backup and analysis.

trackAnythingText: Use Sadhana Pro to track your daily sadhana, yoga practices, meditation, journaling, reading, or any personal habits. With full offline mode and phone installation support, your data stays with you wherever you go.

meta.title: Sadhana Pro – Daily Sadhana Journal, Chart & Tracker
meta.description: Sadhana Pro is your customizable daily sadhana journal, chart, and spiritual practice tracker. Record your progress in meditation, yoga, chanting, or daily habits with reports, offline mode, graph sharing, and CSV export.
